title: Homemade pork, mustard and leek sausages
ingredients: ['900g pork belly', '900g pork shoulder', '1 tablespoon ground mustard seeds', '1 teaspoon ground allspice', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 tablespoon white pepper', '1 1/2 tablespoons salt', '110g fine breadcrumbs', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '85g wholegrain mustard', '3 leeks, minced', '3m to 3.5m (32mm ) natural hog casings']
